title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change right away. This creates inconsistency between the displayed font size and the actual height of the label.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be "18 points".
OB: The label font size does not change instantly upon modification.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly and accurately reflect the chosen font size.
SR:
1. Create a new label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be "18 points". Verify that the height of the label adjusts to match the chosen font size.
